scene.introduction: An Insteon scene allows you to control multiple Insteon devices simultaniously.
scene.name: Scene name

devices.introduction: Add or remove devices from the scene. Select the entities associated with each device that you want the scene to control.

error.load: The device did not respond as expected to the read request.
error.write: The device did not respond as expected to the write request.
error.scene_write: The scene did not save to one or more devices correctly.
error.scene_device_no_entities: There are one or more devices without any entities selected. Please select an entity or remove the device from the scene.
error.device_not_found: An Insteon device was not found.

warn.load: Reading from the device may take a while.
warn.write: Writing changes to the device may will take a while.
warn.add_default_links: Changes will be made to this device and your modem.
warn.wake_up: Because this is a battery operated device, the process will run in the background the next time the device wakes up.

add.caption: Add Insteon Device
add.multiple: The modem is ready to pair. Press the `set` button on the devices you wish to add. When complete press `Stop` below.
add.single: The modem is ready to pair. Press the `set` button on the device you wish to add
add.address: The modem is ready to pair. Attempting the put device --address-- in pairing mode, however, not all devices respond to this request. If the device does not link in the next minute, press the `set` button on the device.

aldb.caption: All-Link Database
aldb.no_data: The All-Link Database has not been loaded. Please load from the device.
aldb.is_loading: The All-Link Database is loading. This may take up to 20 minutes.

properties.caption: Properties
properties.no_data: No properties are available for this device.

descriptions.signal_to_noise_of_last_failure: Signal to noise of last failure
descriptions.disable_auto_linking: Disables automatic linking when the user pushes and holds the SET Button
descriptions.monitor_mode: Enablesd Monitor Mode (see About Monitor Mode in the developers guide)
descriptions.auto_led: Disables automatic LED operation by the modem.
descriptions.deadman: Disable host communications Deadman feature (see IM RS232 Port Settings in the developers guide)
descriptions.relay_mode: Set the relay mode (see owners manual for a description of the options)
descriptions.momentary_delay: Delay in seconds for the relay to turn on/off (depends on relay mode)
descriptions.radio_button_groups: Keypad buttons assigned to act as radio buttions
descriptions.x10_house_2: X10 House Code for button 2 (B: 8 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_house_3: X10 House Code for button 3 (C: 8 button KPL or A: 6 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_house_4: X10 House Code for button 4 (D: 8 button KPL or B: 6 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_house_5: X10 House Code for button 5 (E: 8 button KPL or C: 6 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_house_6: X10 House Code for button 6 (F: 8 button KPL or D: 6 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_house_7: X10 House Code for button 7 (G: 8 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_house_8: X10 House Code for button 8 (H: 8 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_unit_2: X10 Unit Code for button 2 (B: 8 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_unit_3: X10 Unit Code for button 3 (C: 8 button KPL or A: 6 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_unit_4: X10 Unit Code for button 4 (D: 8 button KPL or B: 6 button KPL
descriptions.x10_unit_5: X10 Unit Code for button 5 (E: 8 button KPL or C: 6 button KPL
descriptions.x10_unit_6: X10 Unit Code for button 6 (F: 8 button KPL or D: 6 button KPL
descriptions.x10_unit_7: X10 Unit Code for button 7 (G : 8 button KPL)
descriptions.x10_unit_8: X10 Unit Code for button 8 (H : 8 button KPL)

descriptions.on_mask_2: ON bit mask for radio button settings of button 2 (Button B: 8 button KPL)
descriptions.on_mask_3: ON bit mask for radio button settings of button 3 (Button C: 8 button KPL or A: 6 button KPL)

descriptions.on_mask_8: ON bit mask for radio button settings of button 8 (Button H: 8 button KPL)

descriptions.off_mask_3: OFF bit mask for radio button settings of button 3 (Button C: 8 button KPL or A: 6 button KPL)
descriptions.off_mask_4: OFF bit mask for radio button settings of button 4 (Button D: 8 button KPL or B: 6 button KPL)

descriptions.off_mask_8: OFF bit mask for radio button settings of button 8 (Button H: 8 button KPL)

descriptions.ramp_rate_3: Ramp rate for button 3 (Button C: 8 button KPL or A: 6 button KPL))
descriptions.ramp_rate_4: Ramp rate for button 4 (Button D: 8 button KPL or B: 6 button KPL))

descriptions.on_level_8: Default on level for button 8 (Button H: 8 button KPL)
descriptions.led_blink_on_error_on: The LED should blink on errors
descriptions.ack_a_scene: ACK a scene - Allow the clean up messages tell other devices a scene is active
descriptions.no_cache: Do not use device configuration cache (very slow)
descriptions.relay_mode_off: Relay Mode: true = on/off switch  false = dimmer switch
descriptions.do_not_rotate_to_off: Dial should not rotate to off position
